name: Guitar Hero III Custom: Rock the Games
overview: Song List Includes: Stage 1-1 --------- Megaman X6 - Gate Battlefield 1942 - Battlefield 1942 Theme Super Mario 64 - Bowser's Road Super Mario 64 - Powerful Mario The Legend of Zelda OoT - Lost Woods Stage 1-2 --------- Shadow The Hedgehog - Never Turn Back Sonic Adventure 2 - Escape from the City The Legend of Zelda OoT - Gerudo Valley Sonic Adventure 2 - It Doesnt Matter Banjo Kazooie - Spiral Mountain Stage 2-1 --------- Dynasty Warriors 3 - Yellow Storm Corey Vs.
